content: in rib if you want to make a funnel or polo neck keep working until your neckband is the desired length page7 of 9 copyright © kate harvie all rights reserved for personal use only 13 august 2024 sleeves both alike using larger needle and with rs facing take 2 sts off safety pin at underarm and knit them puk 18 19 20 20 20 22 25 26 sts up first side of armhole puk 18 19 20 20 20 22 25 26 sts down second side of armhole k the first underarm st and pm for start of round 38 40 42 42 42 46 52 54 sts work in st st all rounds k for 4 rounds next round decrease round ssk k to last 2sts k2tog decrease by 2 sts total 36 38 40 40 40 44 50 52 sts continue in st st decreasing in same manner on every 4th 5th 5th 5th 6th 6th 5th 5th round 7 5 6 8 7 2 11 12 times more then on every - 4th 4th - - 5th - - round - 2 2 - - 7 - - times decrease by 14 14 16 16 14 18 22 24 sts total 22 24 24 24 26 26 28 28 sts work straight until sleeve measures 16 5 19 21 5 23 24 26 29 32 cm 6 5 7 5 8 5 9 9 5 10 25 11 5 12 5 in from underarm change to smaller needles next round k1 p1 to end of round repeat last round until cuff measures 2 5 2 5 2 5 3 3 3 3 5 3 5 cm 1 1 1 1 25 1 25 1 25 1 5 1 5 in or desired length bind off loosely in rib using larger needle work second sleeve in the same manner finishing weave in all remaining ends on inside of work soak garment in warm water with a drop of washing up liquid or woolly wash for 20-30 minutes short spin or roll in towels to remove excess water pull gently into shape and allow to dry flat page8 of 9 copyright © kate harvie all rights reserved for personal use only 13 august 2024 abbreviations bobble bind cast off co cast on cont continue decrease decrease dpn double pointed needles k knit k2tog knit two together decreasing by 1 lh left hand m marker p purl patt pattern pm place marker p2tog purl two together decreasing by 1 prev previous puk pick up and knit rem remaining repeat repeat rh right hand rs right side ssk slip 2 stitches knitwise one at a time insert left needle from left to right through front loops of these stitches and knit both together 1 stitch decreased ssp slip 2 stitches knitwise one at a time return sts to left needle and purl together through the back loops 1 stitch decreased st s stitch es st st stocking or stockinette stitch
